title: Enable HPET (High Precision Event Timer)
name: enable-hpet
warning: May increase input latency on some systems
description: Forces use of the High Precision Event Timer (HPET), which can reduce stuttering and improve timing accuracy on some hardware.
deepDescription: Enables the High Precision Event Timer (HPET) by setting useplatformclock to true via bcdedit, which can improve timing accuracy and reduce stuttering on some systems, though may increase input latency in others.
